main.name: Ahmad Khan
main.bio: I am currently an undergraduate at Duke University and am planning on a double major between Computer Science and Electrical & Computer Engineering. Coming into Duke, I already learned about computer hardware and software troubleshooting, as indicated by the Comptia A+ Certification I earned. Now I am focusing on programming skills in JavaScript, Java, and Python, as well as developing my skillset in cyber security and system administration.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me using the form below:

resume.skillmessage: Some of my key skills include: Java, Python, JavaScript, React, HTML/CSS, Git, Linux, and computer hardware

education.description: Member of Muslim Student Association, Alpha Phi Omega, Questbridge Scholar

work.title: IT Technician
work.description: Responsible for troubleshooting Windows and Apple products for Duke Medical students, as well as overseeing Duke Medical students' devices using Jamf and Airwatch to ensure security compliance

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: I used ReactJS and React-router to develop the about pages for GTHC; I also set up Linux dual-boot development environments for team members and performed PR reviews with other members

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
